name: Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer.

genre.name: Thriller

name: Spider-Man
description: Young high school student Peter Parker finds himself with the powers of a spider, and must now juggle the responsiblities of being a hero and a teenager.

Director.bio: Sam Raimi is an American producer, writer, and director.

genre.name: Action
